name: Ragdoll Kanojo
description:
This game Is only For mature

VR IS OPTIONAL! (But recommended) You can play on your monitor too!

Have fun with your own virtual ragdoll girl!

In Ragdoll Kanojo you will interact with a lovely virtual girl.
Designed to be as realistic as possible using the latest technology, Ragdoll Kanojo features muscle simulation, fat, body physics, and super realistic graphics.

customize clothes and Style, Pose!

  • Customize the character by choosing from a variety of clothing sets, accessories, and colors.
  • Put the girl in any position you want using realistic body physics.
  • Mix physics with animations to enhance the scene.
  • Create scenes by positioning lights and objects.
  • Choose from different scenarios.
  • Save and load scenes and customizations of the girl.
